result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Craig J Rogers

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Craig J Rogers not in court, in custody.  Attorney Connor Romenesko in court for Craig J Rogers.  Attorney James Griffin in court on behalf of Attorney Francesco Mineo for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Defense requests a date for plea and sentencing.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Craig J Rogers not in court, in custody.  Attorney Connor Romenesko in court for Craig J Rogers.  Attorney Francesco Mineo appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Attorney Romenesko recently appointed.  Court scheduled a status conference.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Attorney Connor Romenesko

Defendant Craig J Rogers appeared by video.  Attorney James Griffin for  Francesco Mineo in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status of counsel. Defendant advises has not talked to family and would need too. State ask that defendant speak with family before next court date. Court advises defendant to have update from family for next hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 4.
Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Craig J Rogers in court with attorney Theodore OReilly.  Defendant Craig J Rogers in custody.  Francesco Mineo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant appears via Zoom.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defendant wishes to retain private counsel. Case adjourned for status of counsel hearing, Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Filed: Original Transcript of PRELIMINARY HEARING (15 pages) commencing 06-24-2022 by Sandra M. Kandziora.

Defendant Craig J Rogers in court, appear by video with attorney Theodore OReilly, appear by video.  Defendant Craig J Rogers in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer J. Hermann.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Craig J Rogers in court with attorney Theodore OReilly.  Defendant Craig J Rogers in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Craig J Rogers appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 3.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
